name: Swipe Santa Out!
description:
Ho Ho Ho Merry Christmas everyone!

Santa has brought you a crazy arcade game to play this holiday! Santa and his friends need help escaping out of Santa's Workshop and the North Pole! Along the way there are candy cane traps, moving ice, and many more exciting obstacles. If you are up for the challenge, come help save Santa and Christmas!

Swipe in the correct direction to unlock the door and see what's behind it! Collect coins along the way or even use a few power ups! Mush...Mush... MUSH!

Swipe Santa Out! is Official Santa Greenland approved app!
Santa Greenland webpage can be found here: http://santa.gl

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
